bibl.title: P. Naqlun Inv. 27+28/88. A Document from an Egyptian Monastery and the Procedure of ἀναψηλάφησις / retractatio.

series.title: Wydzial Prawa i Administracji Uniwersytetu Warszawskiego

bibl.note: The document concerns juridical matters, including the procedure of ἀναψηλάφησις (retractatio). Monastery of Naqlun, 6th century.

bibl.title: Au-delà des frontières. Mélanges de droit romain offerts à Witold Wolodkiewicz

bibl.seg: DERDA Tomasz and Jakub URBANIK, P. Naqlun Inv. 27+28/88. A Document from an Egyptian Monastery and the Procedure of ἀναψηλάφησις / retractatio.

Maria ZABLOCKA et Jerzy KRZYNOWEK, Jakub URBANIK, Zuzanna SLUZEWSKA (Édd.), Au-delà des frontières. Mélanges de droit romain offerts à Witold Wolodkiewicz = Wydzial Prawa i Administracji Uniwersytetu Warszawskiego (Varsovie, 2000) pp. 197-205 et 1 pl.
The document concerns juridical matters, including the procedure of ἀναψηλάφησις (retractatio). Monastery of Naqlun, 6th century.
